actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for regular physical examinations.

summary.text: Authorizes the payment under the supplementary medical insurance program of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act for annual comprehensive physical examinations.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for regular physical examinations.
